name: Neo Nexus Bot
description:
Welcome to the chaotic world of blooland! Assemble your squad, gear up, and explose until the bitter end against hordes of other players who are all vying for the coveted top spot.

'The game is only developing i.e. not and functional the game was made by a person so without any experience most of the sprites are hotline miami 2 up to the moment, in future the sprites are remake'
